channel.title: What is the best source for a beginner?
channel.description: Hello! i have the testscape source but i don't like it so much, and i wanna know what are the best source for a beginner in this of moparscape

item.title: What is the best source for a beginner?
item.dc:creator: @Awesomeishness Awesomeishness
item.description:
@Awesomeishness wrote:

Try Hyperion, just search up some tutorials, then try it out.

Search on what really troubles you.

Read full topic

item.title: What is the best source for a beginner?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

no trading, noclipping, lots of bugs, etc etc. its a mess :o
and i dont think a beginner could solve all that, and the fact that its 562? gl
try finding a version with fixed trade at least

item.title: What is the best source for a beginner?
item.dc:creator: @raiden123 raiden123
item.description:
@raiden123 wrote:

drubrkletern:

try pkplanet, has lots of bugs and stuff, but it has lots of features, like minigames and stuff, (also working gwd stances and specs)

lots of bugs? not exist a simple source with all features working and without bugs like runescape? i think that will be a great base source

is not a request, is a question for know what source is the best for my

Also the hypernion thread have all links broken and idk where to find one!
